name: Paperhost.com
overview:
PaperHost.com, Inc. provides online document storage, hosting, and document management solutions and services. It offers software as a service solutions, which include phUPLOAD, a data capture solution; phINDEX, which is used for indexing documents online; phSCAN scanning software, a document imaging/batch scanning software; and phCONNECT, a distributed document capture solutions. The company also provides online document repository and document retrieval, document scanning, customized document imaging, and integration services. In addition, it offers PC-based retrieval software. The company serves financial services, real estate, healthcare, construction, legal services, accounting, and human resources industries. It has a strategic alliance with Lexmark International, Inc.

PaperHost.com, Inc. was founded in 2000 and is based in Roswell, Georgia.
